title: Need team to own my friends (CLASH)
body:
So my friends think they would have a better win chance in Clash if they play without me. They wont accept me because i never reached gold rank, so now here i am makeing a team, and hopefully one time playing against them and destroying them. 

**What i offer:**

* Play several times (2-3) a week together as a team
* Profit oriented game
* And of course, have fun


**What are the requirements:**

* No Flame, League of Legends can be very emotional, so we need relaxed players.
* Time (2-3 a week)
* teamwork
* An Elo of bronze 5, at least, no matter what season (The rank is not so issuing if you have good teamplay)

If you are interested please ad **GameWolf **for more information.
